name: Vyoopoint
tag_list: website-presentation, design-presentations, creative-presentations, interior-design-visual-presentations, web-design-presentation, design-sign-off, architectural-design-presentation, online-presentation-tool, web-based-application
overview:
Vyoopoint is an online design presentation tool - a must have tool for every creative professional. Why? Because it was designed and built by designers, for designers and visual artists, which guarantees 100% efficiency.

With Vyoopoint, uploading and presenting visual material to anyone else is now really easy. It was created by Dsire Inc. As a design agency, they used to manually build all their design presentations so their clients could review them online. It was really inefficient, so they decided to create a presentation tool that would make that process much faster for them and much easier for their clients. The team wanted a better way to make design presentations, to get notes & comments, and to have their design work approved faster by their clients. So they built Vyoopoint.

They also wanted to be sure that the client sees the work clearly so that the design gets signed off faster & easier. That’s why they created an easy to use presentation tool that is not cluttered with buttons and panels and text. Instead Vyoopoint has a streamlined interface that truly shows the design work in its cleanest form without additional visual noise interfering with what is being presented.

And they also made Basecamp integration possible because they know quite a few designers manage their design projects with Basecamp.
